message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9500 is still a bit too low for me.  How about $9750?  That would give us both a good deal.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $9600 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
Bob, I understand your position and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's close this deal at $9650. This is my final offer.
